page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: IT First we decide who will be it. Then the person chases people. When the person touches you, you are it next. Any amount of people can play it. The circle in the playground is home. PIGGY IN THE MIDDLE Three people can play, one is the pig. The two people stand opposite each other a few metres apart and the pig stands in the middle, one of the outside people have a tennis ball and throw it to each other trying not to let the pig catch the ball. If the pig does catch the ball the one who threw it goes in the middle and becomes the pig.
